content: 2sc flo in next single_crochet repeat across 3sc in last single_crochet turn row 9 ch4 counts as tc st 2dc in first st skip 1 st 2dc flo in next st repeat across skip 1 st 2dc & 1tc in tch turn row 10 ch4 counts as tc st 2dc in first single_crochet ch1 skip 1 double_crochet esc flo in next double_crochet repeat across ch1 skip 1 double_crochet 2dc & 1tc in tch turn row 11 ch2 does not count as single_crochet st 3sc in first single_crochet skip 1 double_crochet 2sc flo in next double_crochet skip 1ch 2sc flo in next esc repeat across skip 1ch 2sc flo in next double_crochet skip 1dc 3sc in last single_crochet turn plain row 12 ch2 does not count as single_crochet st 3sc in first single_crochet single_crochet flo in each single_crochet across 3sc in last single_crochet turn increase row 13 ch2 does not count as single_crochet st 3sc in first single_crochet 1 single_crochet flo in each of next 6sc 2sc flo in next single_crochet repeat across 3sc in last single_crochet turn row 14 ch2 does not count as single_crochet st 3sc in first single_crochet skip 1st 2sc flo in next single_crochet repeat across skip second last single_crochet 3sc in last single_crochet ch4 turn ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~switch to smaller hook 4 0 mm ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ row 15 ch4 counts as tc st 1dc in first single_crochet ch3 skip 2sc half_double_crochet in next single_crochet repeat across ch3 skip 2nd last single_crochet 1dc & 1tc in tch turn row 16 ch4 counts as tc st 1dc in first double_crochet ch1 slip_stitch in next double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet in ch3 space slipstitch in half_double_crochet repeat across slip_stitch in 2nd last st 1dc & 1tc in tch turn row 17 ch2 does not count as single_crochet st 3sc in first st single_crochet in 1st double_crochet ch3 skip 3st single_crochet in double_crochet repeat across ch3 skip 3st single_crochet in last double_crochet 3sc in last st turn row 18 ch2 does not count as single_crochet st 3sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in each of next 2 single_crochet slipstitch in next single_crochet 2sc ch4 2sc in ch3 space repeat across slipstitch in next single_crochet single_crochet in each of next 2 single_crochet 3sc in last single_crochet fasten_off weave in ends block enjoy you have my permission to gift donate sell trade barter beam up or enjoy your shawls
